description: This source file implements backend API functions for managing GRE (Generic Routing Encapsulation) parameters within the COSA Data Model Library. It includes functions for retrieving and setting string parameters, specifically handling a parameter named 'X_RDK_PublicHotspotData', and provides mechanisms for processing such data.

methods.name: ULONG Gre_GetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pValue,ULONG * pUlSize)
methods.description: Retrieves the string value of a specified parameter; supports 'X_RDK_PublicHotspotData'. Returns success, buffer size issue, or unsupported indicator.

methods.name: BOOL Gre_SetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pString)
methods.description: Sets the string value of a specified parameter; processes 'X_RDK_PublicHotspotData' via 'unpackAndProcessHotspotData' function.
